00069 GraphicView::GraphicView( QWidget* parent )
00070 : QAbstractItemView( parent ), m_sceneGraphRoot(0)
00071 {
00072     Trace trace( "GraphicView::GraphicView" );

00074 
00075 void GraphicView::SetSceneGraph( SoSelection* sceneGraphRoot )
00076 {
00077     Trace trace( "GraphicView::SetSceneGraph" );
00078     m_sceneGraphRoot =  sceneGraphRoot;
00079     m_myRenderArea = new SoQtExaminerViewer( this );
00080     m_myRenderArea->setGLRenderAction( new SoBoxHighlightRenderAction() );
00081     m_myRenderArea->setSceneGraph( m_sceneGraphRoot );
00082    // m_myRenderArea->setBackgroundColor(SbColor(0,0,0));
00083     
00084     ViewCoordinateSystem( true );
00085 }
00086 
00087 SbViewportRegion GraphicView::GetViewportRegion() const
00088 {
00089         return m_myRenderArea->getViewportRegion();
00090 }

00176 void GraphicView::currentChanged( const QModelIndex & current, const QModelIndex& /*previous*/ ) 
00177 {
00178         Trace trace( "GraphicView::currentChanged", false );
00179 
00180     m_sceneGraphRoot->deselectAll();
00181     SoFullPath* path;
00182     QVariant variant = current.data(Qt::UserRole);
00183     if ( variant.canConvert<PathWrapper>() ) 
00184     {
00185         path = static_cast< SoFullPath*>( variant.value<PathWrapper>().GetPath() );
00186             m_sceneGraphRoot->select( path );
00187            
00188     }
00189     m_sceneGraphRoot->touch();
00190 }
